Avoid the toilet or you will go down the toilet... and the game will be over.It uses springs to make Jumping Pouf Poo jump higher and move more quickly from a platform to another.Select "Automatic updates" to receive the new version of the game when it becomes available soon.Send us your suggestions to tunasoftapp@gmail.comDescription and operation of the game:Navigate by moving between platforms possible higher. To do this, you must use the accelerometer of the device, moving it from side to side.
